page.title: 16HOUSING-STANLEY & OUTWOOD
page.content: THIS IS A DORMITORY AREA,HOUSING BEING CONCENTRATED ON STANLEY,OUTWOOD AND LOFTHOUSE GATE,ALTHOUGH NONE OF THESE HAS AN IDENTIFIABLE VILLAGE CENTRE.10% CONSISTS OF VICTORIAN AND EDWARDIAN RIBBON DEVELOPMENT ALONG THE A61, A642 AND ADJACENT STREETS.ORIGINALLY BUILT FOR RENTING MOST ARE NOW PRIVATELY OWNED AND HAVE BEEN IMPROVED BY FITTING INSIDE TOILETS,BATHROOMS AND CENTRAL HEATING.OTHER MID-VICTORIAN SQUARES HAVE BEEN DEMOLISHED,BEING SUBSTANDARD IN EVERY RESPECT. 60% OF HOUSES WERE BUILT IN THE 1930'S HALF ARE PRIVATELY OWNED,THE REST ON COUNCIL ESTATES AT OUTWOOD AND STANLEY THE REMAINING DWELLINGS WERE BUILT IN THE LAST 30 YEARS AND ARE ALL DETACHED OR SEMIDETACHED, EACH WITH A GARAGE OR GARAGE SPACE. PRICES FOR THESE VARY FROM Â£20000 TO Â£45000.
